name: simple-repo-search
description: A simple React frontend to search GitHub repos

scripts.install: npm run install-react && npm run install-elm
scripts.install-elm: cd elm-frontend && npm i -g elm && npm i
scripts.install-react: cd react-frontend && npm i -g yarn && yarn install
scripts.build: npm run build-react && npm run build-elm
scripts.build-elm: cd elm-frontend && elm make src/SimpleRepoSearch.elm --output srs-elm-frontend.js
